name: Checklist
description:
Made in 2 weeks for the class "Experimental Game Development"

We wanted to explore the the thought process of thinking of tasks, and how easy it is to be overwhelmed with responsibilities after starting any amount of tasks.

Click on any of the items to get started.

Simon - Programmer

Nick - Programmer

Noah - Artist

Alex - Artist

Rachel - Writer

Dylan - Writer

Another cool feature of this is how it works on the back end. It reads from a text file which is parsed into a tree. All of the content is generated from that tree, making editing the tasks incredibly easy.
